lines.text: Blink once and you're dead.
Blink twice and you're buried.

[to Carol as she leaves]
Power to the people.

[to Coffin Ed Johnson]
The trick is to catch Brother Wolf's ass in the briar patch... Right?

[after being beat up by Gravedigger and Coffin]
Don't ya recognize me?... It's me, I've come back... I'm Charleston Blue.
You ain't nothin but a god-damned pusher!
[She slashes his neck with a straight razor]

[Carol sees Gravedigger Jones and Coffin Ed Johnson sitting at her table]
I thought you said I should be seen with the right people, Uncle Caspar?... Does that include a couple of Uncle Tom cops?

[Gravedigger and Coffin Ed refuse to arrest Earl J]
I have as much right as anyone to be a black militant Terrorororist!

[Charleston Blue's coffin is opened up, and a straight razor is found, which Gravedigger picks up]
Well, maybe Charleston Blue has come back... As an angel.
Ain't no black angels... Except us.

[Talking about Carol]
You can take the girl outta Harlem, but you can't take Harlem outta the girl.

[to Mago]
Your people were here first, right?
You're damned right!
My people were here when your granddaddy was still stealing horses in Sicily!

[after he saves Carol]
Carol, listen to me... You're a whole lot blacker than what you think.

[to Carol]
Now, you're part of the revolution... The Rabbit Revolution... And Brother Rabbit and Brother Wolf got a big difference of opinion about that honey tree... And Little Sister Fox, she ain't the only one that big bad wolf been trickin'
So, the trick is to catch Brother Wolf's ass in the briar patch, right?
Right.

[Coffin Ed and Gravedigger catch Joe with the heroin]
If you guys get rid of me, the mafia will be back here tomorrow.
We'll worry about that tomorrow.

[after the sergeant calls him a "boy"]
Don't call me that... My name is Douglas Wright, Junior.

[after Her Majesty kills Joe]
Did you see anything?
Nah... I must be getting nearsighted in my old age.

[to Coffin Ed and Gravedigger when a bomb is about to go off]
You better watch your ass... According to my calculations, you got about four and three quarters seconds to get out of here.
[They run for cover]
Did you check those distribution lines?
Yeah, they're tighter than a rat's ass.
Joe Painter... YOU BITCH!

[Chasing bartender down the street]
Come back here, you ugly fat ball-headed Mother Hubbard!

[singing to the tune of Swing Low, Sweet Chariot]
Gravedigger and Coffin Ed, they was livin' but now theys dead... Swing loooww, sweet charrriot... Comin' for to carry em hoooommme.

[Coffin Ed is beating up Joe, and won't let up]
The son-of-a-bitch gets done in by a cop... It's gonna turn him into a hero!

[Gravedigger and Coffin Ed are directing traffic, and are angry at Joe]
Ya know, black people gotta start workin' together instead of always tryin' to do each other in.

[to Joe]
Nigger, its what you're putting in black arms that's gonna burn your ass one of these days!

[Coffin Ed and Gravedigger have caught Joe with the heroin hiddin in a coffin]
Up here in Harlem, all the dead are black.

[to Coffin Ed]
Come on, man!... Ain't nobody make a dumb nigger stick a needle in his arm!

[Chasing after Carol]
WHEN I GET YOU, YOUR ASS IS GONNA BE MIINNNEEE!
[Jumps down the elevator shaft]

[Coffin Ed and Gravedigger let Joe get away]
How do I tell headquarters that two of my men participated in a major gun battle while riding shotgun on one of the biggest narcotics shipments in history?... Do you know what that will do to my career?
Well, it ain't gonna do nothin' for our careers either, Captain.
